title: Same-Sex Relationship Affirmation Debate | Unapologetic 82
itunes:title: Same-Sex Relationship Affirmation Debate | Unapologetic 82
description: June is LGBTQ pride month and whether or not same-sex relationships are sinful is a point of contention in the Western Church. In this episode, Bobby and I take opposite sides of the issue and lay out our best case.
